SELECT t_produce_process.id, process_id, us.name AS process_user_id, t_produce_task.begin_date as begin_date, t_produce_task.end_date as end_date, t_produce_process.process_type as process_type, t_sys_purchase_product.name as product_id, number FROM t_produce_process LEFT JOIN t_sys_users AS us on t_produce_process.process_user_id = us.id LEFT JOIN t_produce_process_detail ON t_produce_process.id = t_produce_process_detail.process_id LEFT JOIN t_produce_task ON t_produce_task.id = t_produce_process.id LEFT JOIN t_sys_purchase_product ON t_produce_process_detail.product_id = t_sys_purchase_product.id WHERE t_produce_task.id=#{0}
